ygData.subject: RE: spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: The First yes, DoT do specific damage over time. On Transfers yes always the same because they are instant save for Vampric Curse which is a Leech DoT and it
ygData.messageBody:
The First yes, DoT do specific damage over time. On Transfers yes always the
same because they are instant save for Vampric Curse which is a Leech DoT
and it keels going after a mobs death too. Answered the 3rd in another
post.


Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights

<--- Enigma --->
http://members.door.net/enigma

-----Original Message-----
From: ken satchell "flash-net & nikken distrubter" [mailto:ken4p@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 12:46 AM
To: EQ_Masters@onelist.com; EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] spells?

From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>

Got a question on spells?
on dot's they start off with a certain amount then continue doing
more over time. will it all ways do the same amount as long as the taget is
alive?
on transfer's which I thought only necro's get it take an amount and
gives it to the necro. will this amount all ways be the same as long as the
mob has it and you can take it?
but on dd the amount varies if what I have seen on the web sites is
correct? is there any way to help insure you get a good shot does range
effect it?


On a specific spells does anyone know about heart flutter? I looked a web
site and it said 20 mana and 100 dmg it might have been dot but it also had
str and a/c reduced. this sound very effecient to meeee....


Ken
